overview:
Entrepreneur, CTO & Co-Founder at BEE tv.

A veteran technologist that has worked in technological startups since 1999. Prior to that Yaniv served for three years in the Israeli army as a software engineer. Yaniv is one of the leading consultants for web startups in Israel & Europe. In his last role he was the System architect of inLive which enables the creation of mass participation TV shows through Telephones, Mobile devices and IPTV Remote Controls. Some of Yaniv’s work was covered on top technology blogs like TechCrunch, Mashable & Zdnet. Yaniv was top 3 nominated at the Europrix Top Talent Award 2004 at Vienna. Yaniv is 31, has a wife and 2 kids and lives in Israel.
